title: What is the typeface used in Million Dollar Arm?
content: I just saw the movie yesterday and really liked the fonts used throughout the movie and in the credits. It was a slab serif and I think it may have been Lubalin Graph but I can't confirm this because I don't have a picture.
author: kalee11

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830182626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mill1_5267.jpg)
This is the cover and don't see any slab serif
Not from the cover, from the credits.

Can you find an image?  
Don
No! I wish I could, I've been looking all day. I'll post if I find something. Thanks!
